title: AdventOfCode
description: Solutions to the Advent of Code challenges.

title: EverybodyCodes
description: Solutions to the Everybody Codes challenges.

title: mcc
description: Mini C-Compiler, based on Nora Sandler's Blog Series 'Writing a C Compiler'.

title: mcc2
description: Second iteration of the mini C-Compiler, based on Nora Sandler's finished Book 'Writing a C Compiler'.

title: Kadro
description: Monogame based game framework, used for some of my games.

title: RKDnet
description: A library for game networking, based on Lidgren.Network, used in my games.

title: Simulado
description: Project for Monogame experiments, such as particle based physics.

title: bcvm
description: An experimental bytecode based virtual machine, used as mcc backend.
